data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Al Jawf, Yemen to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Jawf, Yemen
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Al Jawf.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Al Jawf, Yemen to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Al Jawf, Yemen.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Malay people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Al Jawf, Yemen to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Al Jawf.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Al Jawf
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.
